fullText: The Outsiders is a show that works on every level - as a faithful adaptation of beloved source material, as a musical with soaring songs and dynamic choreography, and as a theatrical experience that creates genuine emotional connection.
dtliExcerpt: The Outsiders is a show that works on every level - as a faithful adaptation of beloved source material, as a musical with soaring songs and dynamic choreography, and as a theatrical experience that creates genuine emotional connection.
